scripts.start: node --import "data:text/javascript,import { register } from \"node:module\"; import { pathToFileURL } from \"node:url\"; register(\"ts-node/esm\", pathToFileURL(\"./\"));" app.ts
scripts.dev: nodemon --import "data:text/javascript,import { register } from \"node:module\"; import { pathToFileURL } from \"node:url\"; register(\"ts-node/esm\", pathToFileURL(\"./\"));" app.ts
